Articles.Content:
I'm really starting to love Career,

Looking forwards to when it brings back the challenge of cutting corners and shoddy engineering that endangers kerbals managing parts and budgets restraints. Reminds me of the old forum campaign race to the Mun.. <insert shameless="" plug=""></insert>

Wait, you telling me that you haven't played Campaign yet?! Blasphemy!

On a serious note, it is pretty fun
I'm a bit OCD for collecting, so if I started on Mods I'd go all pokemon on them... I do swing a little leeway for some DV calculations.
